events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position. Thank you for your interest in joining our engineering team.
Your application has been categorised under the Engineering department based on your background and the role you applied for.
A recruiter specialized in technical roles has been assigned to manage your application and guide you through the hiring process.
We conducted the initial screening call and were impressed with your technical skills and experience relevant to the software developer role.
Thank you for your prompt response and availability for the next steps. We appreciate your enthusiasm for the engineering position.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for April 21st at 10:00 AM UTC. Please prepare to discuss coding challenges and system design.
The technical interview was completed successfully; the panel noted your strong problem-solving skills and coding proficiency.
Your HR interview is scheduled for April 24th at 3:00 PM UTC to discuss cultural fit and company values.
The HR interview was conducted smoothly, and the team appreciated your communication skills and alignment with company culture.
We are pleased to propose you an offer for the Software Engineer role with competitive compensation and benefits.
You have provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed eagerness to join the engineering team.
Congratulations! You have accepted the offer, and we are excited to welcome you aboard as part of our engineering department.
Your onboarding process has started; you will receive access to all necessary tools and orientation to accelerate your integration.
The recruitment process has been successfully closed. We look forward to your contributions as a key member of our engineering team.
